recipesJson.name: Strawberry Jam Monster
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: Well guys I find this one pretty damn close too the real thing so give it a mix and try it out for yourself and I stamp it with a S&V approval

reviews.text: I wouldn't call this a ripoff of Waynes, different brands of some of the ingredients and different percentages.  This isn't bad, the strawberry is definitely there.  It does need more butter though.  The toast is spot on.  Not really a clone of the original, but pretty tasty.  Good job on this one.
lmao so you basically just ripped Wayne's recipe to make your own? This is why no one takes you seriously.
